name: Urban Greenery (AI Template)
description: Template created from project: Urban Greenery (AI Template)
author: Admin AI

config.title: Urban Greenery Perception Survey
config.description: This survey explores the psychological, aesthetic, and functional impacts of urban greenery in streetscapes. Your responses will guide improvements in urban planning and design, focusing on how greenery influences urban street environments.

pages.name: research_objective
pages.title: Research Objective
pages.description: The purpose of this survey is to investigate how urban greenery affects perceptions of streetscapes, including aesthetic appeal, environmental benefits, and personal preferences. We aim to understand the impact of greenery on urban street environments.

pages.name: introduction
pages.title: Introduction
pages.description: Welcome to the Urban Greenery Perception Survey. This study aims to explore the psychological and functional impacts of urban greenery on residents across various environments. Your insights will aid in enhancing urban design and planning.

pages.name: theoretical_context
pages.title: Theoretical Context
pages.description: Urban greenery plays a crucial role in enhancing the quality of life in cities. Concepts from urban ecology and environmental psychology suggest that greenery can improve mental health, increase biodiversity, and enhance urban aesthetics.

pages.name: demographics
pages.title: Demographics
pages.description: To help us understand the diversity of our participants, please provide some information about yourself.

elements.name: age
elements.title: What is your age?

elements.name: gender
elements.title: What is your gender?

elements.name: education
elements.title: What is your highest level of education?

elements.name: transport
elements.title: What modes of transportation do you use? (select all that apply)

elements.name: urban_area
elements.title: Which type of urban area do you reside in?

pages.name: sampling_strategy
pages.title: Sampling Strategy
pages.description: We plan to gather perspectives from a diverse range of urban environments. Participants will be recruited using online platforms and community outreach, stratified by urban area types to ensure a representative sample.

pages.name: greenery_psychological_impact
pages.title: Psychological Impact of Urban Greenery
pages.description: Evaluate how urban greenery impacts your psychological well-being.

elements.name: stress_reduction
elements.title: On a scale of 1-5, how does urban greenery in your area contribute to your stress reduction?

elements.name: mood_enhancement_frequency
elements.title: How frequently do you feel that greenery in urban areas enhances your mood?

pages.name: greenery_perception
pages.title: Perception of Urban Greenery
pages.description: Evaluate these street environments based on the presence and impact of greenery.

elements.name: beauty_rating
elements.title: How visually pleasing do you find these streets due to greenery?

elements.name: greenery_preference
elements.title: Which street do you prefer based on greenery?

elements.name: green_space_rank
elements.title: Rank these streets from most to least green:

pages.name: greenery_functional_benefits
pages.title: Functional Benefits of Urban Greenery
pages.description: Evaluate how urban greenery provides functional benefits in these streets.

elements.name: greenery_criteria
elements.title: Rate these streets based on these criteria:

elements.name: functional_effectiveness
elements.title: Rate the effectiveness of urban greenery in providing shading and noise reduction.

pages.name: greenery_awareness
pages.title: Awareness of Urban Greenery Benefits
pages.description: Assess your awareness of the benefits provided by urban greenery.

elements.name: psychological_benefits_awareness
elements.title: On a scale of 1 to 5, how aware are you of the psychological benefits provided by urban greenery in your environment?

elements.name: types_of_greenery_awareness
elements.title: Which types of greenery are you aware of in your urban environment? (select all that apply)

elements.name: personal_engagement
elements.title: How often do you engage with green spaces in your area?

pages.name: greenery_impact
pages.title: Impact of Greenery
pages.description: Assess how urban greenery impacts your perception of these streets.

elements.name: environmental_benefits
elements.title: To what extent do you agree that these streets improve air quality and temperature regulation due to greenery?

pages.name: streetscape_design_elements
pages.title: Streetscape Design Elements
pages.description: Evaluate specific streetscape design elements and their impact on your perception.

elements.name: tree_placement
elements.title: How effective is the tree placement in enhancing the street's aesthetic appeal?

elements.name: pedestrian_pathways
elements.title: How do pedestrian pathways integrate with greenery in these streets?

pages.name: specific_greenery_assessment
pages.title: Detailed Greenery Assessment
pages.description: Provide detailed feedback on specific street environments.

elements.name: thermal_comfort
elements.title: How comfortable is the thermal environment in this street?

elements.name: describe_street
elements.title: Describe what you see in this street and any emotional benefits you associate with it:

elements.name: personal_experience
elements.title: Please describe a personal experience where urban greenery significantly impacted your well-being.

elements.name: suggestions
elements.title: What improvements would you suggest for the integration of greenery in urban areas?

pages.name: conclusion
pages.title: Conclusion
pages.description: Thank you for participating in our survey.

elements.name: feedback
elements.title: Any additional comments or feedback?
